votebox.middle.view.widget

Class FocusedToggleButtonState

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.view.widget.AToggleButtonState
      • votebox.middle.view.widget.FocusedToggleButtonState

  • public class FocusedToggleButtonState
extends AToggleButtonState
    This class represents the focused state of a ToggleButton.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FocusedToggleButtonState Singleton
      Singleton Design Pattern

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private FocusedToggleButtonState()
      Singleton Design Pattern

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void focus(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is currently focused on it.
      IViewImage getImage(ToggleButton context)
      Because the image that is used to represent a toggle button is state-speciffic, getImage is delegated here.
      void makeDeselected(ToggleButton context)
      Explicitly deselects the element who delegates to this state object.
      void makeSelected(ToggleButton context)
      Explicitly selects the element who delegates to this state object.
      void select(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user has chosen it to be toggled.
      void unfocus(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is no longer focused on it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getImage

        public IViewImage getImage(ToggleButton context)
        Description copied from class: AToggleButtonState
        Because the image that is used to represent a toggle button is state-speciffic, getImage is delegated here.
        Specified by:
        getImage in class AToggleButtonState
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.
        Returns:
        This method returns the state-specific image that represents the delegating button.
        See Also:
        AToggleButtonState.getImage(votebox.middle.view.widget.ToggleButton)

      • makeSelected

        public void makeSelected(ToggleButton context)
        Description copied from class: AToggleButtonState
        Explicitly selects the element who delegates to this state object. This will happen regardless of the current state.
        Specified by:
        makeSelected in class AToggleButtonState
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.
